categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dhaiv was a male Human who was one of the Sith Lord Shalath's five Sith apprentices during the Cold War. Dhaiv and the others were sent to use Sith runes in a ritual to bind a Sithspawn, but they were killed by Dromund Kaas's wildlife before they could complete the ritual. He carried the Rune of Victory.
